trans-unit.source: Represents an SQL transaction to be made at a data source.
trans-unit.target: 表示在資料來源進行的 SQL 異動。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
The application creates an OdbcTransaction object by calling <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> on the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式建立 OdbcTransaction 物件藉由呼叫<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>上<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection>物件。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: All subsequent operations associated with the transaction (for example, committing or aborting the transaction) are performed on the OdbcTransaction object.
trans-unit.target: OdbcTransaction 物件上執行交易 （例如，認可或中止交易） 相關聯的所有後續作業。

trans-unit.source: Commits the database transaction.
An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試認可交易時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
-or- The connection is broken.

Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection"></xref> object associated with the transaction, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the transaction is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection"></xref>與交易相關聯的物件或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果交易已不再有效。

trans-unit.source: A single application may have multiple database connections, each with zero or more transactions.
trans-unit.target: 單一應用程式可能有多個資料庫連線，每個都有零個或多個交易。

trans-unit.source: This property lets you determine the connection object associated with a particular transaction created by <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您判斷<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>所建立的特定交易相關聯的連接物件

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection"></xref> object associated with the transaction.
To be added.
To be added.
Specifies the <xref href="System.Data.IsolationLevel"></xref> for this transaction.
Parallel transactions are not supported.
Therefore, the <xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel> applies to the whole transaction.
The <xref href="System.Data.IsolationLevel"></xref> for this transaction.
The default depends on the underlying ODBC driver.
trans-unit.target: 預設值取決於基礎的 ODBC 驅動程式。

trans-unit.source: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.
trans-unit.target: 從暫止狀態會回復交易。

trans-unit.source: The transaction can be rolled back only from a pending state (after <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> has been called, but before <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A> is called).
trans-unit.target: 交易可以回復只會從暫止狀態 (之後<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>之前已呼叫<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A>稱為)。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction.Commit%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The transaction will be rolled back in the event it is disposed before `Commit` or `Rollback` is called.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的事件中加以處置之前，將會回復交易`Commit`或`Rollback`呼叫。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試認可交易時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
-or- The connection is broken.
